item.description:
Venez passez un bon moment à discuter en français à Panera Bread (Dover). Choisissez un petit déjeuner, un snack, ou une bonne tasse de café pour accompagner notre discussion.

**************

NOTE: If members show interest, the Saturday morning meeting will become a monthly event, probably on the first Saturday. This meeting will be in Dover because it's convenient for the host[ess]; however, as always, please contact Pam if you'd like to host a meeting more convenient to chez vous!

**************

>> As announced in my recent email to the group, the 2013 annual dues is $20. This amount offers a discount on the $1/event fee if you attend twice per month and substantial savings if you attend more meetings this year (and we're talking about having 4 meetings per month, so it's not only convenient but a great deal!). Cash is preferred, but you also may pay by check [made out to Pam Angulo] at your next event. <<
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Ana at the far right corner of the café--she should have a red and white Meetup sign on the table!

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Matinée francophone au café - samedi
